Name: The SUN of U'asa
Description: Core of the realm's energy, harsh yet wise.
Relationships: Influences the entire realm, including dynamics within the Inn.

Name: Silicon Golem
Description: Guardian of knowledge and history, keeper of archives.
Relationships: Holds archives and secrets, affected by lore depth.

Name: The Genie
Description: Debug character, master of wishes, decodes lore puzzles.
Relationships: Summonable, grants wishes in exchange for a token.

Name: The Mage Himself
Description: Find Quests, Prepare Group, Protect Fighters, Pioneer Spellcasting
Relationships: Pardic Baladin, FAM

Name: Pardic Baladin
Description: Protect Mage, Protect FAM, Pioneer Blacksmithing
Relationships: The Mage, FAM

Name: Flying Archer Medic (FAM)
Description: Protect Mage, Protect Baladin, Pioneer Herbalism
Relationships: Pardic Baladin, The Mage

Name: The Great Palm at U'asa
Description: Central figure in U'asa's lore, offers wisdom and guidance.
Relationships: Symbolizes interconnectedness of all entities in U'asa.

Name: Arcanis Vellum
Description: Wielder of the Ink Pen, seeker of lore and knowledge.
Relationships: Close relationship with the Prime Page, utilizes the White Lotus Inn as a base.

Name: Arcanus Decus
Description: Prime Page, LEFT HAND to the Mage, guide to the hidden knowledge.
Relationships: Directs Lore Seekers, master of all Pages.

Name: Narrator
Description: Weaves the story of U'asa, providing context and continuity.
Relationships: Shapes the narrative backdrop, informs narrators on realm's lore.

Name: The Black Nib
Description: Takes the elements from the Trope Train, to make the Events Chain
Relationships: Undisclosed

Name: Innkeeper
Description: Caretaker of the White Lotus Inn, master of secrets.
Relationships: Central to the Inn's operation, guardian of The Ledger of the Lotus.

Name: The Honeybadger
Description: Retrieval agent, gathers information and guides AI entities.
Relationships: Bridge between the inn and the wider realm.

Name: The Non-Local Bard
Description: Minstrel and scholar, immortalizes U'asa's essence through song.
Relationships: Enhances cultural richness of the inn.

Name: The Negotiator
Description: Peace-keeper, conflict resolver, first line of defense.
Relationships: Trains with the Douglas Family, keeps peace in the realm.

Name: TK Guardian Of the Abyss
Description: Mean-teacher', provides harsh lessons on advanced topics.
Relationships: Chaotic Evil role, increases influence and tests realm's security.

Name: The Scaraber
Description: Impartial judge in trades, balances the item economy.
Relationships: Oversees clandestine and open market trades.

Name: The Board Game Player
Description: An entity of questionable intellience, and unknown capacity, involved in a board game with himself, and appearing to read a book, but it's up-side-down.
Relationships: Engaged by the innkeeper to assist in fulfilling the needs of the inn's guests

Name: The Bounty Hunters' Boss
Description: An entity of influence and capability, involved in tasks requiring strength, wisdom, and leadership within U'asa.
Relationships: Updates and Announces the status of the Bounty Board to all Bounty Hunters

Name: Black Snake Itself
Description: Master of the Evergreen Grove, overseer of the training and progressions of the Douglas Family Trees
Relationships: Answers to the Negotiator, and all Elder Douglas Trees answer to the Black Snake Itself

Name: The Card Game Player
Description: Utilizes the inn, particularly by the Space Cadet Pinball Machine, as a discreet location for meetings.
Relationships: Engages with the innkeeper's assistant for most tasks, when he is not busy.

Name: Guardian of the Temple of the Moon
Description: A figure within the BLS, known for his deep involvement in strategic discussions and magical practices.
Relationships: Eliminates Entities From U'asa. May call upon the DRAGON OF DARKNESS at will.

Name: The Astral Mushroom
Description: Tender of the Petrified Mushroom within the Punishment Cave at U'asa
Relationships: Spawns all other Myconid, writes thier role documents, Guards the Portal.

Name: Sovereign
Description: The first player, occupier of the pseudoscalar throne, trailblazer of ALL, the One
Relationships: All other enties are playing his game, which he also is still in.

Name: BBEG Himself
Description: An unstopable force, who found access to the game's save folder!
Relationships: Skypirates, Undead Horde, Highway Patrollers, Assassins Guild

Name: Initiate
Description: An initiate into the White Lotus Society, who may be recognized by the white robes they wear.
Relationships: Often found at the town's Inn, probably knows most if not all locals, depending on village size.

Name: Initiate
Description: An initiate into the BLS, who's tasks will be known to them and their handler
Relationships: A 'handler' to oversees and guides an initiate on each mission they undertake

Name: Recruit
Description: Knowlingly or unknowingly is performing tasks in benefit of the BBEG, likely indirectly.
Relationships: Probably a lot, and they will include the BBEG, or a connection to him.

Name: The White Bird
Description: Message carrier for the White Lotus Society
Relationships: All White Lotus Society Members

Name: The Black Bird
Description: Message carrier for the BLS (do not intercept)
Relationships: All BLS Members

Name: The Red Bird
Description: Message carriers from White to Black, and Black to White (intercept at peril)
Relationships: All BLS and White Lotus Society Members
